name: Skeleton Crew (itch) (bieere)
description:
NOTE:  Because of the rushed nature of the final product, I know there are some communication issues with tasks. Here is a cheat sheet:
    • Floor 1: Align both stations to centre the crosshairs
    • Floor 2: Match Numbers at both stations to displayed value
    • Floor 3: Drag Sliders down until bar is full
    • Floor 4: Reset Breakers, user generator in centre, pressing space until light turns green

WELCOME CREW MEMBER,

YOU ARE NOW PART OF THE SKELETON CREW TO KEEP THE SHIP CORE NOMINAL. FAILURE TO COMPLY WILL RESULT IN YOUR SWIFT DISPOSAL.

Skeleton crew tasks players with maintaining systems in an ever-aging ship. You are not privy to the happenings outside of your workspace, so it's best to keep your head down and stay busy.
